languages.text: {n}Офицер кивает.{/n} "Используем инсектицид из наших резервов, Ваша Светлость. Настоящих боевых ядов у нас нет, но поверьте, этому паразиту и того хватит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Офицер кивает.{/n} "Применим ядовитый агент, Ваше Благородие. Обычно его используют за забоя бракованных гроксов, но для людей он столь же летален".

languages.text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер кивает.{/n} "Используем инсектицид из наших резервов, Ваша Светлость. Настоящих боевых ядов у нас нет, но поверьте, этому паразиту и того хватит".

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."
{n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."
{n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."
{n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

languages.text: {n}将校がうなずく。{/n}「備蓄していた殺虫剤を使うのです、陛下。軍用グレードの毒はありませんが、問題ないでしょう。こんな寄生虫相手ですから」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

traits.locale_text: {n}将校がうなずく。{/n}「備蓄していた殺虫剤を使うのです、陛下。軍用グレードの毒はありませんが、問題ないでしょう。こんな寄生虫相手ですから」

languages.text: {n}军官点点头。{/n}“我们用的是杀虫剂，大人。我们并没有军用级别的毒药，但我们也并不需要。对付这种寄生虫，杀虫剂就够了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官点点头。{/n}“我们用的是杀虫剂，大人。我们并没有军用级别的毒药，但我们也并不需要。对付这种寄生虫，杀虫剂就够了。”

languages.text: {n}El oficial asiente.{/n} «Hasta ahora usábamos insecticida de nuestras reservas, {mf|milord|milady}. No tenemos veneno de uso militar, pero no lo necesitamos para este parásito».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial asiente.{/n} «Hasta ahora usábamos insecticida de nuestras reservas, {mf|milord|milady}. No tenemos veneno de uso militar, pero no lo necesitamos para este parásito».

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier nickt.{/n} "Mit Insektiziden aus unseren Vorräten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben keine militärischen Gifte, aber die brauchen wir auch nicht, nicht für diesen Parasiten."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier nickt.{/n} "Mit Insektiziden aus unseren Vorräten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben keine militärischen Gifte, aber die brauchen wir auch nicht, nicht für diesen Parasiten."

languages.text: {n}L'officier hoche la tête.{/n} « Oui, Votre Seigneurie, avec l'insecticide que nous avons en réserve. Nous n'avons pas d'agents toxiques de classe militaire, mais ce n'est pas nécessaire pour ce genre de vermine. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier hoche la tête.{/n} « Oui, Votre Seigneurie, avec l'insecticide que nous avons en réserve. Nous n'avons pas d'agents toxiques de classe militaire, mais ce n'est pas nécessaire pour ce genre de vermine. »

languages.text: {n}Subay, onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Depomuzdaki böcek ilaçlarını kullanıyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Askerî düzey zehre sahip değiliz. Kaldı ki böyle bir parazit için ihtiyacımız da yok."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer nods.{/n} "We're using insecticide from our stockpiles, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We don't have any military-grade poisons, but we don't need them, not for this parasite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Subay, onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Depomuzdaki böcek ilaçlarını kullanıyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Askerî düzey zehre sahip değiliz. Kaldı ki böyle bir parazit için ihtiyacımız da yok."
